languages.text: {n}Прислушавшись к ответному треску, техношаман открывает было рот, чтобы что-то сказать, но Паскаль властно перебивает его:{/n} "Префект-вычислитель сообщает, что ему известно мое имя и знакома моя сила. Он уважает мою миссию и дарует мне право присутствия в иерархии экипажа. Бинарный толмач, твоя задача исполнена".

{n}The tech-shaman listens to the crackling that comes in response and opens his mouth to say something, only for Pasqal to interrupt him in a tone of authority:{/n} "The Prefect Enumerator has stated that he knows my name and is familiar with my power. He respects my mission and grants me a place within the crew's chain of command. Your work here is done, binharic interpreter."
languages.original_text: {n}Прислушавшись к ответному треску, техношаман открывает было рот, чтобы что-то сказать, но Паскаль властно перебивает его:{/n} "Префект-вычислитель сообщает, что ему известно мое имя и знакома моя сила. Он уважает мою миссию и дарует мне право присутствия в иерархии экипажа. Бинарный толмач, твоя задача исполнена".

He respects my mission and grants me a place within the crew's chain of command. Your work here is done, binharic interpreter."

languages.text: {n}技術祈祷師はパチパチ鳴る応答音に耳を傾け、何か言おうと口を開く。しかしパスカルが厳然とさえぎる。{/n}「監督列挙子は自分の名を知っており、その力も熟知していると述べた。自分の使命に敬意を払い、自分を乗務員の指揮命令系統に組み込んだ。ここでのあなたの仕事は以上だ、ビンハリック通訳者」
languages.original_text: {n}The tech-shaman listens to the crackling that comes in response and opens his mouth to say something, only for Pasqal to interrupt him in a tone of authority:{/n} "The Prefect Enumerator has stated that he knows my name and is familiar with my power. He respects my mission and grants me a place within the crew's chain of command. Your work here is done, binharic interpreter."

traits.locale_text: {n}技術祈祷師はパチパチ鳴る応答音に耳を傾け、何か言おうと口を開く。しかしパスカルが厳然とさえぎる。{/n}「監督列挙子は自分の名を知っており、その力も熟知していると述べた。自分の使命に敬意を払い、自分を乗務員の指揮命令系統に組み込んだ。ここでのあなたの仕事は以上だ、ビンハリック通訳者」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}技术萨满听着噼里啪啦的回应，张开嘴想说些什么，但帕斯卡用威严的语气打断了他。{/n}“统领计算器说他知道我的名字，也知道我的权力。他尊重我的使命，并在船员指挥系统中给了我一个位置。你在这里的工作已经完成了，二进制翻译员。”
languages.original_text: {n}The tech-shaman listens to the crackling that comes in response and opens his mouth to say something, only for Pasqal to interrupt him in a tone of authority:{/n} "The Prefect Enumerator has stated that he knows my name and is familiar with my power. He respects my mission and grants me a place within the crew's chain of command. Your work here is done, binharic interpreter."

traits.locale_text: {n}技术萨满听着噼里啪啦的回应，张开嘴想说些什么，但帕斯卡用威严的语气打断了他。{/n}“统领计算器说他知道我的名字，也知道我的权力。他尊重我的使命，并在船员指挥系统中给了我一个位置。你在这里的工作已经完成了，二进制翻译员。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Le technochaman écoute attentivement les crépitements du vox caché, mais alors qu'il ouvre la bouche pour parler, Pasqal l'interrompt sur un ton autoritaire :{/n} « Le préfet enumerator a déclaré connaître mon nom et être au fait de mon pouvoir. Il respecte ma mission et m'accorde une place dans la chaîne de commandement de l'équipage. Nous n'avons plus besoin de vous, interprète binhaire. »
languages.original_text: {n}The tech-shaman listens to the crackling that comes in response and opens his mouth to say something, only for Pasqal to interrupt him in a tone of authority:{/n} "The Prefect Enumerator has stated that he knows my name and is familiar with my power. He respects my mission and grants me a place within the crew's chain of command. Your work here is done, binharic interpreter."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le technochaman écoute attentivement les crépitements du vox caché, mais alors qu'il ouvre la bouche pour parler, Pasqal l'interrompt sur un ton autoritaire :{/n} « Le préfet enumerator a déclaré connaître mon nom et être au fait de mon pouvoir. Il respecte ma mission et m'accorde une place dans la chaîne de commandement de l'équipage. Nous n'avons plus besoin de vous, interprète binhaire. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}El tecnochamán escucha el crujido que suena como respuesta y abre su boca para decir algo, pero Pasqal lo interrumpe con un tono de autoridad:{/n} «El Enumerador de Prefectos ha afirmado que sabe mi nombre y reconoce mi poder. Respeta mi misión y me otorga un puesto en la cadena de mando de la tripulación. Su labor aquí ha concluido, intérprete binario».
languages.original_text: {n}The tech-shaman listens to the crackling that comes in response and opens his mouth to say something, only for Pasqal to interrupt him in a tone of authority:{/n} "The Prefect Enumerator has stated that he knows my name and is familiar with my power. He respects my mission and grants me a place within the crew's chain of command. Your work here is done, binharic interpreter."

traits.locale_text: {n}El tecnochamán escucha el crujido que suena como respuesta y abre su boca para decir algo, pero Pasqal lo interrumpe con un tono de autoridad:{/n} «El Enumerador de Prefectos ha afirmado que sabe mi nombre y reconoce mi poder. Respeta mi misión y me otorga un puesto en la cadena de mando de la tripulación. Su labor aquí ha concluido, intérprete binario».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Der Tech-Schamane lauscht dem Knistern, das als Antwort ertönt. Er öffnet den Mund, um etwas zu sagen, doch Pasqal unterbricht ihn in autoritärem Ton:{/n} "Der Präfekt Enumerator hat gesagt, dass er meinen Namen kennt und von meiner Macht weiß. Er respektiert meine Mission und gewährt mir einen Platz in der Befehlskette der Crew. Eure Arbeit hier ist getan, Binhär-Dolmetscher."
languages.original_text: {n}The tech-shaman listens to the crackling that comes in response and opens his mouth to say something, only for Pasqal to interrupt him in a tone of authority:{/n} "The Prefect Enumerator has stated that he knows my name and is familiar with my power. He respects my mission and grants me a place within the crew's chain of command. Your work here is done, binharic interpreter."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Tech-Schamane lauscht dem Knistern, das als Antwort ertönt. Er öffnet den Mund, um etwas zu sagen, doch Pasqal unterbricht ihn in autoritärem Ton:{/n} "Der Präfekt Enumerator hat gesagt, dass er meinen Namen kennt und von meiner Macht weiß. Er respektiert meine Mission und gewährt mir einen Platz in der Befehlskette der Crew. Eure Arbeit hier ist getan, Binhär-Dolmetscher."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Tekno şaman, gizli vokstan yanıt olarak gelen çatırtıları dinleyip bir şeyler söylemek için ağzını açıyor. O sırada Pasqal, otoriter bir ses tonuyla onu durduruyor.{/n} "Prefekt Sayaç, ismimi bildiğini ve gücüme aşina olduğunu belirtti. Görevime saygı duyuyor ve mürettebatın emir komuta zincirinde bana bir yer tahsis ediyor. Görevin sona erdi ikilidil tercümanı."
languages.original_text: {n}The tech-shaman listens to the crackling that comes in response and opens his mouth to say something, only for Pasqal to interrupt him in a tone of authority:{/n} "The Prefect Enumerator has stated that he knows my name and is familiar with my power. He respects my mission and grants me a place within the crew's chain of command. Your work here is done, binharic interpreter."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tekno şaman, gizli vokstan yanıt olarak gelen çatırtıları dinliyor ve bir şeyler söylemek için ağzını açıyor ancak Pasqal onu otoriter bir ses tonuyla durduruyor:{/n} "Prefekt Sayaç, ismimi bildiğini ve gücüme aşina olduğunu belirtti. Görevime saygı duyuyor ve mürettebatın emir komuta zincirinde bana bir yer tahsis ediyor. Görevin burada sonlanmış bulunuyor ikilidil tercümanı."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
